verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> that Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Neriah, <S%H5374><s%> when he had written <S%H3789><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%> at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to you, O Baruch: <S%H1263><s%>

You did say, <S%H559><s%> Woe <S%H188><s%> is me now! <S%H4994><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has added <S%H3254><s%> grief <S%H3015><s%> to my sorrow; <S%H4341><s%> I fainted <S%H3021><s%> in my sighing, <S%H585><s%> and I find <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> rest. <S%H4496><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall you say <S%H559><s%> to him, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> thus; <S%H3541><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> I have built <S%H1129><s%> will I break <S%H2040><s%> down, <S%H2040><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> I have planted <S%H5193><s%> I will pluck <S%H5428><s%> up, even this <S%H1931><s%> whole <S%H3605><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

And seek <S%H1245><s%> you great <S%H1419><s%> things for yourself? seek <S%H1245><s%> them not: for, behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but your life <S%H5315><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> to you for a prey <S%H7998><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> places <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you go. <S%H3212><s%>
